stats.strengthDescription: Increases Attack (2x per point) and slightly increases Defense (0.5x via Dexterity)
stats.dexterityDescription: Increases Speed (1.5x per point) and Critical Chance (0.1% per point)
stats.intelligenceDescription: Increases Magic Attack (2x per point), Mana (3x per point), and Magic Defense (0.5x per point)
stats.vitalityDescription: Increases Health (10x per point) and Defense (1.5x per point)
stats.wisdomDescription: Increases Mana (5x per point), Magic Defense (1.5x per point), and slightly increases Magic Attack (0.5x per point)
